value.title: Convert JSON strings to tables in Power Query/ Power BI

Some additional resources: Meetup: https://www.meetup.com/preview/Sweden-Power-BI-User-Group/events/242804557  Import Json files from Erik: https://eriksvensen.wordpress.com/2014/09/15/specifying-json-query-in-power-query-example-statistics-sweden/
